solution_line_template: In the first stretch he drove {speed1} miles/hour x {time1} hours = <<{speed1}*{time1}={distance1}>>{distance1} miles
In the second stretch he drove {speed2} miles/hour x {time2} hours = <<{speed2}*{time2}={distance2}>>{distance2} miles
After the gas station he drove {speed3} miles/hour x {time3} hours = <<{speed3}*{time3}={distance3}>>{distance3} miles
In total he drove {distance1} miles + {distance2} miles + {distance3} miles = <<{distance1}+{distance2}+{distance3}={total_distance}>>{total_distance} miles
